issue.title: Coulomb friction parameters not handled properly in simbody

content.raw:
We [added some simbody friction parameters to sdformat](https://bitbucket.org/osrf/sdformat/pull-request/32/merging-some-updates-from-simbody-branch/diff#chg-sdf/1.4/surface.sdf) but those changes were only in physics.sdf, which corresponds to the default friction values for each link. However, there is no way in sdformat to specify friction on a per-collision basis. I will create an sdformat issue for this.

EDIT: I've added this to [sdformat issue 31](https://bitbucket.org/osrf/sdformat/issue/31/use-common-friction-parameters-across).
content.html:
We added some simbody friction parameters to sdformat but those changes were only in physics.sdf, which corresponds to the default friction values for each link. However, there is no way in sdformat to specify friction on a per-collision basis. I will create an sdformat issue for this.

EDIT: I've added this to sdformat issue 31.
